description: Associates a core network Connect peer with a device and optionally, with a link. If you specify a link, it must be associated with the specified device. You can only associate core network Connect peers that have been created on a core network Connect attachment on a core network.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of your global network.

parameters.name: ConnectPeerId
parameters.description: The ID of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: ConnectPeerAssociation
nested_items.description: The response to the Connect peer request.

nested_items.name: ConnectPeerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the device to connect to.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the Connect peer association.
